EmailTemplate.name: 18-Util Crit Comms-Util Architecture-Email-UAWeek2018-T002BE.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Nokia at UAW 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Navigate your way to a next-generation utility Join Nokia at Utility Analytics Week in Orlando, Florida 24-26 October, 2018 Please join Nokia at Utility Analytics Week 2018, in Orlando, Florida from Oct 24 - Oct 26, to see to how using machine learning and advanced analytics can create valuable outcomes for your business.
Discover how:
- analytics applications can help maximize value from your processes, people and assets - how featured applications can provide intelligent solutions to optimize asset lifecycle and asset reliability - how analytics can support capital an regulatory planning
At Utility Analytics Week, learn how to navigate your path as a next-generation utility with greater automation and new business model opportunities. Meet us at Booth 31 <[[http://www.utilityanalyticsweek.com/register-2/]]> Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
